name: Bizzuka, Inc.
tagline: Digital Marketing Agency serving SME clients.
description:
Founded in 2000, Bizzuka has grown to become the largest provider of business websites in the state of Louisiana. The company's approach earns quantifiable improvements for its clients through expert web design and internet marketing services, including SEO, content marketing, and conversion rate optimization.
Bizzuka's contemporary digital strategies are grounded by the classic practices of compelling copywriting, unique design, and clear and consistent presentation of the client's value proposition. The firm treats each client as a special case, custom-tailoring each project and strategy to their needs.
Bizzuka strives to maintain long-term relationships with its clients, an aim characterized by its 95% client retention ratio.
